title: あの子と、その子と、隣の子

text_block_list.text: Some time after Matikanetannhauser's debut race, on a certain day.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Trainer! It's a big deal, a big deal!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Um, well, that! Anyway, TV, TV, the TV!
Urged on, I hurriedly turn on the TV—

text_block_list.name: Announcer A
text_block_list.text: 'Interviewing the promising newcomers of the year! Today's spotlight is on Mihono Bourbon, who showed amazing talent in her debut race!'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wow, Bourbon-san is really running on TV, running~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wow, I heard she was being interviewed! It's amazing, isn't it~? As someone who debuted around the same time, I'm proud!
Chukyo Racecourse, the stage of her debut race, was buzzing with excitement over Mihono Bourbon's talent.

text_block_list.name: Man A
text_block_list.text: From a slow start, she charged through the straight to finish first! Wow, that was thrilling!

text_block_list.name: Woman A
text_block_list.text: Her legs and hips are really solid too, so I bet she'll keep improving.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: You're called a notable big newcomer, but straight up, what are your current goals in the Twinkle Series!?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: My target is solely to achieve the Classic Triple Crown.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: I see...! Excuse me, that's a bit surprising, I thought it'd be the sprint route...!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: My aptitude is for short distances, but that doesn't matter. Achieving the Triple Crown is non-negotiable.
Her calm declaration in front of the camera was already fully confident.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ooh...! That's so cool! As expected of Bourbon-san!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh? Wait, if it's the Triple Crown route, does that mean I'll be racing against Bourbon-san?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Oh my!
Meanwhile, around that time, the same program was playing in the dormitory lobby.

text_block_list.name: Announcer A
text_block_list.text: "――Next up, a special feature on the Umamusume active in the Classic and Senior classes!"

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: So, it's gotta be those two, right?

text_block_list.name: Announcer A
text_block_list.text: The one now hailed as the strongest stayer, Mejiro McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Announcer A
text_block_list.text: And the genius Tokai Teio, who swept the 'Japanese Derby' and 'Satsuki Sho' undefeated for a double crown!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Wow, that's amazing...

text_block_list.name: Announcer A
text_block_list.text: "It's a gathering of lead-class Umamusume! The day they might clash could come soon."

text_block_list.name: Expert
text_block_list.text: "Yes. But it's a shame about Tokai Teio's injury right after the Derby."

text_block_list.name: Expert
text_block_list.text: "A full recovery in six months, right? I heard she won't run in the Kikuka Sho. I thought a triple crown was certain."

text_block_list.name: Announcer A
text_block_list.text: "Yes. Many were eagerly awaiting the birth of a triple crown Umamusume. Personally, I'm also disappointed she's skipping the race."

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...If she could run, a triple crown was certain...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
...
...Yeah, that's right...
A few days later.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mmm, I ran and ran again today! Good work, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh? Is that... Nature?
Following Matikanetannhauser's gaze, there was Nice Nature, watching the grounds with a somewhat gloomy expression.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm... Actually, Trainer. Um, she's been like that for a few days now.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It's starting to worry me a little bit. ...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'll go talk to her for a bit!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Nice Nature's fortune for today is...
Minor Blessing! Might be a bit of a blue day.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
But it's okay! The lucky Umamusume is
her, whose name starts with 'Ma' and ends with 'er'!
If you chat, your mood will turn happy!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huh, what's up, all of a sudden?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Uh, well...
Fuku-chan senpai play!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Right now, the lucky Umamusume will
listen to anything you have to say~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Just kidding.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
--Pfft, hehe...!
What are you even doing, seriously...!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
...Sigh, thanks.
I made you worry, huh. Sorry.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
So, will you listen for a bit?
Umamusume-san whose name starts with 'Ma' and ends with 'er'.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
...You know, I've been thinking
I want to run in the 'Kikuka Sho'.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Originally, I was inspired by Teio,
and thought, I'll give it a shot!
So I've been training pretty hard, but...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
...I saw a show where they were lamenting
that Teio couldn't run in the 'Kikuka Sho', and it got me thinking.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
They're saying stuff like, if she'd run,
she'd have definitely won the Triple Crown...
How selfish can they be...!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
That's what Teio must be feeling the most,
right? But she couldn't run.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Even though she's been working hard since she was little
to become an undefeated Triple Crown Umamusume,
it became impossible...!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
She's holding back such intense frustration,
and yet people around her say, 'If she'd run, it was certain'...
That's tough. Really tough.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Yeah.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
...And also, whoever wins the 'Kikuka Sho'
is definitely going to be called this.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
The Umamusume who won the 'Kikuka Sho'
that Teio couldn't run in.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
If, say, I could win the 'Kikuka Sho',
I'd be super happy, right?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: But you know, if Teio were here, I bet that 'if Teio were here' phrase would keep following me around...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Haha, I sound like I'm talking nonsense even before the race starts. But somehow, I end up thinking about all sorts of pointless things—

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ah, geez! I'm so lame!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Right now, I need to focus more and run hard...
Matikanetannhauser gently watched Nice Nature's downcast face.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Tannhauser, what would you do in a situation like this?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh? Me?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm, well... but I think I'd probably feel the same way as you, Nature.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Because it's still on your mind, right? I think I'd feel all fuzzy about it too.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But still, putting that aside, I think the desire to win the 'Kikuka Sho' is always there in the back of my mind.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...Yeah.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...So, yeah.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'd probably try to win first place with so much momentum that no one would even say 'if Teio were here'!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...Huh?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I think that's the only way! To win so overwhelmingly that everyone forgets about Teio—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Win by a landslide!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Huh? Are you listening?
A sudden silence. The two of them looked taken aback. And then—

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...Heh, fufu, ahahaha!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh? Huh!?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ah, geez! That's right, you're that kind of person. ...I've woken up.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I have to face forward and push through. Moping around won't help at all.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...Yeah, I'll win. I'll win by a landslide, me. It's definitely not impossible.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...! I don't really get it, but you're feeling better?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah, ...thanks.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Woo-hoo! Yay, yay, yay! What should we do? Run toward the sunset!?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ahaha! Absolutely not.
The two head back to the academy, playfully jostling each other. Nice Nature's expression is bright and clear.

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: 'Even if you don't shine like the sun, your weapon is one of a kind! You have the power to take someone's hand and push their back!'
It felt like Director Akikawa's words from that day were echoing from the high sky.
